response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $1,500,000 to me, reflecting its unique features, quality, and the value it brings to its owner. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000, providing you with a significant savings while securing an extraordinary asset. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this special offer. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 1200000}
